abstract: Matchday 3 in the Champions League opens with eight games and some new questions.
snippet: Matchday 3 in the Champions League opens with eight games and some new questions.
lead_paragraph: Matchday 3 in the Champions League opens with eight games and some new questions: When will Bayern Munich give up a goal? When will Manchester City and Manchester United win a game in this round? When will Inter turn things around? And where did Thorsten Fink disappear to?

headline.main: Champions League Tuesday Preview: Bayern's Steel Curtain, and Mourinho's Return
